entry.title: HO-CTO/sre-monitoring-as-code
entry.summary: Monitoring-as-Code (MaC) is a jsonnet mixin implementation of SLIs/SLO/Error Budgets using the open-source monitoring and alerting eco-system of Prometheus and Grafana.
